talk.author: did:plc:sqrfvc3whmkz5btcmapky63d
talk.utter: Tell Tom to “do better”, he always loves that ☺️

talk.author: did:plc:sa3qiun2ccmqqqlooxcsyxkq
talk.utter: Where did I do that? I want him to know that as someone who’s read both his books of expertise (nuke policy) and punditry (education policy) I’ve lost some respect for him over this comment, and why.

talk.author: did:plc:sqrfvc3whmkz5btcmapky63d
talk.utter: Well if your point was “it is sad and, frankly, pathetic for Tom to like one of my tweets” believe me, he knows ☺️
